title: New: Anna Dellaria – Sudden
content:
Huge pop songwriting from San Francisco’s Anna Dellaria on her latest single, Sudden.

Tinges of almost 80’s-esque balladry, collide with an absolutely killer vocal and super tight production – this is really heart-on-sleeve, scream your lungs out stuff. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
